front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments--Security Services for Applications and Management Messages - Amendment 1

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Secure message formats and processing for use by Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) devices, including methods to secure WAVE management messages and methods to secure application messages are defined. Administrative functions necessary to support the core security functions are described.
